messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] OT pagan childcare
messages.msgSnippet: Tracy, Could you please repost that website.  I think I deleted it and would like to check it out. Thanks, Bonnie ...
messages.messageBody:
Tracy,

Could you please repost that website. I think I deleted it and would like
to check it out.

Thanks,

Bonnie


>From: "Nanci and Thomas Kuykendall" <tn-k4of5@...>
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
>To: unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
>Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] OT pagan childcare
>Date: Wed, 19 Jul 2000 17:30:38 -0700
>
> >This is off-topic, I know, but I know there are a few Pagans on here
> ><g> ......A friend of mine has a website
> >Tracy
>
>
>Tracy, I just wanted to say...THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!!
>
>This website is wonderful. While not as large as I am sure it will be one
>day, it is full of many more things than Pagan Childcare. It has Playgroup
>listings, family ritual and holiday activities, links to Pagan
>homeschooling and Unschooling Website and message boards, and many other
>things. It is a wonderful thing for a Pagan family like ours. Thanks
>again!
>
>Nanci K.
>
